sect1.title: Internationalization
sect1.para: Thanks to members of the worldwide GNOME Translation Project, under the leadership of Christian Rose and Danilo Å egan, GNOME &version; offers support for 37 languages (at least 80 percent of strings translated).

Supported languages:
Afrikaans ()
Albanian (5 million speakers)
Arabic (235 million)
Azerbaijani (28 million)
Basque (580,000)
Belarusian (7 million)
Brazilian Portuguese (175 million)
Breton ()

Catalan (7 million)
Chinese Simplified (over 1 billion)

Czech (11 million)
Danish (5.3 million)
Dutch (over 21 million)
English (341 million)
Estonian (1 million)
Finnish (over 5 million)
French (over 75 million)
Galician (3 million)

Greek (15 million)
Gujarati (46 million)
Hindi (370 million)

Note that Galician, Indonesian, Nepali, and Vietnamese, are new supported languages in GNOME &version;, thanks to the hard work of their translators. Also worthy of mention is that British English and Canadian English are also supported.
Many other languages are partially supported, with more than half of their strings translated.
